name: Puzzle Ball: Spherical Shadows
description:
Puzzle Ball: Spherical Shadows is a collective effort amongst three Honours program students who were tasked with developing a game of their choice in addition to their individual research projects for the year all rooted under the topic of "Entertainment Computing".

Minimum Requirements:
Nothing Intensive - was built on a i5-4460 with 8gb ram so way under that should be good.  Minor stutters if running on Intel Integrated Graphics without a dedicated GPU.

The following assets were also used in the development of PB:SS:
Models:
Space Robot Kyle                        Sci-Fi Enemies
Modular Cabin - Erika Moya      Ball Pack - YounGen Tech
Sci-Fi Styled Modular Pack        Sci-Fi Drones - Lokus Bodor

Music:
Power Music for Awesome Games - Aural Space
Music for Puzzle Games - Aural Space
Sound Pack Free Pack - University of Games
